        public CompletableFuture<BlockRead> addBlockRequest​(TorrentId torrentId,
                                                    Peer peer,
                                                    int pieceIndex,
                                                    int offset,
                                                    int length)
        Description copied from interface: DataWorker
        Add a read block request.
        Specified by:
        addBlockRequest in interface DataWorker
        Parameters:
        torrentId - Torrent ID
        peer - Requestor
        pieceIndex - Index of the requested piece (0-based)
        offset - Offset in piece to start reading from (0-based)
        length - Amount of bytes to read
        Returns:
        Future; rejected requests are returned immediately (see BlockRead.isRejected())

      • addBlock

        public CompletableFuture<BlockWrite> addBlock​(TorrentId torrentId,
                                              Peer peer,
                                              int pieceIndex,
                                              int offset,
                                              BufferedData buffer)
        Description copied from interface: DataWorker
        Add a write block request.
        Specified by:
        addBlock in interface DataWorker
        Parameters:
        torrentId - Torrent ID
        peer - Peer, that the data has been received from
        pieceIndex - Index of the piece to write to (0-based)
        offset - Offset in piece to start writing to (0-based)
        buffer - Data
        Returns:
        Future; rejected requests are returned immediately (see BlockWrite.isRejected())
